ygData.subject: RE: Recruitment
ygData.msgSnippet: I teach u a method.  Why not u borrow 1500pp from Garren, pay us all and still got 100pp pocket money?  He so rich, sure can tahan la ;)
ygData.messageBody:
I teach u a method. Why not u borrow 1500pp from Garren, pay us all and still got 100pp pocket money? He so rich, sure can tahan la ;)

On Monday, 20 September, 1999 5:14 PM, Sereph [SMTP:garford@...] wrote:
> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> My money with Tri and Bambi lah, I bankrupt liao. Owe Zan 500plat, FF 100 and
> You 800. I should get back 200 plat today from selling my silver ruby mask,
> fight among yourself on who wants the money first.
>
> BTW, about guild recruitement, check the next e-mail......
>
> LKW wrote:
>
> > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> >
> > I think nowadays got more than 3 officers liao right? Maybe it's time for
> > flat chest to update all, heh.
> >
> > As for ya support, thx man, kena moved until 'lou bart sai", I decided to
> > give u 1000cp, 100 too little, I also pai seh to give, hehehe.
> >
> > Ziltus.
> >
> > p/s: I spend all my money in bank getting the 7int/7str necklace, a pair of
> > 4int rings and a mask of 7str/7wis (2200pp). Worst, I gotta help someone
> > to pay for his mask, ie another 800pp, which make me drier than a "iron
> > grape" ;) Now whoever owe me money, start paying me back hor! ;P
> >
> > On Monday, 20 September, 1999 3:15 PM, Alex [SMTP:leealex@...]
> > wrote:
> > > From: "Alex" <leealex@...>
> > >
> > > we havent put down on blood whats the requirement, but have ssaid that
> > when
> > > 3 offiers agree to the recuitment then go ahead. I think u have to give
> > some
> > > face to our guild mistress even though She/He/it may not be one of the 3
> > > officers that agreed. GIve her face to make up for the flat chest. make
> > her
> > > happy lor. Her parang is still very sharp.....also u may need the
> > chestnut
> > > thingy from her too.
> > >
> > > I support u on your recuitment. Your RL kakis mah. If u cannot recuit
> > your
> > > own RL friend then where got face?
> > > So u have my "approve" vote :)
> > >
> > > BiBi aka Yiyang
> > >
> > > ps. ok u can give me the 100pp NOW for supporting u liao.
> > >
> > >
> > > -----Original Message-----
> > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > To: '* Singapore EQ Mailing List' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > > Date: Monday, September 20, 1999 9:15 AM
> > > Subject: [sg-everquest] Recruitment
> > >
> > >
> > > >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > >
> > > >Got a RL kakis whom I help him from lvl 1 to 13 now, erudin wiz. Wonder
> > > >have our guildmaster/mistress decided on the recruitment requirements
> > liao
> > > >bu? He is now in Qeynos/WK, will try to get him to FP soon. Pls
> > approve
> > > >(kow I dun even know who is the guildmaster/mistress now, hehe).
> > > >
> > > >Ziltus
> > > >
> > > >>Singapore Everquest Players List
> > >
